Perfect for job offers and negotiations

faqs.question: How do I calculate my annual salary?
faqs.answer: Enter your hourly rate or monthly salary, and our calculator will show you the equivalent annual compensation. We factor in standard work hours and pay periods.

faqs.question: What's the difference between gross and net salary?
faqs.answer: Gross salary is your total earnings before taxes and deductions. Net salary is what you actually take home after all withholdings. Use our Gross to Net calculator to see the difference.

faqs.question: How do bonuses affect my total compensation?
faqs.answer: Bonuses add to your total earnings and are included in annual salary calculations. Some bonuses are taxed differently than regular salary.

faqs.question: Can I calculate overtime pay?
faqs.answer: Our overtime calculator handles time-and-a-half calculations. For basic salary conversions, focus on your regular hourly rate here.
